sentence.Network_en: AMMONITE: Ammonite is a protective stone, giving stability and structure to one's life.
sentence.Network_cn: Ammonite 是保护的水晶, 给稳定和协助组织生活.

sentence.Network_en: Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai armour bearer to Joab the son of Zeruiah.
sentence.Network_cn: 37亚扪人洗勒, 比录人拿哈莱(是给洗鲁雅的儿子约押拿兵器的 )

sentence.Network_en: His mother's name was Naamah; she was an Ammonite.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗波安的母亲名叫拿玛, 是亚扪人.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from modern Latin ammonites, from medieval Latin cornu Ammonis 'horn of Ammon', from the fossil's resemblance to the ram's horn associated with Jupiter Ammon (see ammoniacal)

means.word_mean: 1. one of the coiled chambered fossil shells of extinct mollusks

auth_sentence.content: He plans to go to a site in Denmark to retrieve more potential evidence of ammonite survival past KT.
auth_sentence.res_content: He plans to go to a site in Denmark to retrieve more potential evidence of ammonite survival past KT.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He plans to go to a site in Denmark to retrieve more potential evidence of ammonite survival past KT.

auth_sentence.content: Extremely powerful X-rays revealed that the Baculites ammonite's final meal was a small snail and three tiny crustaceans.
auth_sentence.res_content: Extremely powerful X-rays revealed that the Baculites ammonite's final meal was a small snail and three tiny crustaceans.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Extremely powerful X-rays revealed that the Baculites ammonite's final meal was a small snail and three tiny crustaceans.

auth_sentence.content: Both groups of animals are now extinct, but it remains unclear how much the ammonite die-off affected their demise.
auth_sentence.res_content: Both groups of animals are now extinct, but it remains unclear how much the ammonite die-off affected their demise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Both groups of animals are now extinct, but it remains unclear how much the ammonite die-off affected their demise.
